message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 13-a-1, translated into all languages

data.en:
Biennial reports of Annex I Parties in the Convention submitted to the UNFCCC Secretariat.

  • Biennial Reports by Annex I Parties until 2022: https://unfccc.int/BRs, and Biennial Transparency Reports by developed as well as developing country Parties to be reported under Paris Agreement from 2024 onwards: https://unfccc.int/process-and-meetings/transparency-and-reporting/reporting-and-review-under-the-paris-agreement
  • Biennial Assessment and Overview of Climate Finance Flows: https://unfccc.int/topics/climate-finance/resources/biennial-assessment-of-climate-finance.
